write.docs:
This [Action](https://esphome.io/automations/actions.html#config-action) sends a defined UART signal to the given UART bus.

*See also: [`uart.write` Action](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart-write-action)*

baud_rate.docs:
**, int**: The baud rate of the UART bus.

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

data_bits.docs:
**, int**: The number of data bits used on the UART bus. Options: 5 to 8. Defaults to 8.

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

debug.docs:
**, mapping**: Options for debugging communication on the UART hub, see [Debugging](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart-debugging).

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for this UART hub if you need multiple UART hubs.

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

parity.docs:
The parity used on the UART bus. Options: `NONE`, `EVEN`, `ODD`. Defaults to `NONE`.

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

port.docs:
**, string**: Host platform only. Unix style name of the port to use.

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

rx_buffer_size.docs:
**, int**: The size of the buffer used for receiving UART messages. Increase if you use an integration that needs to read big payloads from UART. Defaults to `256`.

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

rx_pin.docs:
**, [Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin to receive data on from the ESP’s perspective. Use the full pin schema and set `inverted: true` to invert logic levels. Not supported by host platform.

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

stop_bits.docs:
**, int**: The number of stop bits to send. Options: 1, 2. Defaults to 1.

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

tx_pin.docs:
**, [Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin to send data to from the ESP’s perspective. Use the full pin schema and set `inverted: true` to invert logic levels. Not supported by host platform.

*See also: [UART Bus](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the UART hub used to connect to the device.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#component)*

data.docs:
**, string or list of bytes**: The data to send via UART. Either an ASCII string or a list of bytes.

*See also: [UART Button](https://esphome.io/components/button/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

**, string or list of bytes**: The data to send via UART. Either an ASCII string or a list of bytes or one or both of the following nested options (see example above).
  * **turn_on** (*Optional*, string or list of bytes): The data to send when turning on.
  
  * **turn_off** (*Optional*, string or list of bytes): The data to send when turning off.
  
  

*See also: [UART Switch](https://esphome.io/components/switch/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

turn_off.docs:
**, string or list of bytes**: The data to send when turning off.

*See also: [UART Switch](https://esphome.io/components/switch/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

turn_on.docs:
**, string or list of bytes**: The data to send when turning on.

*See also: [UART Switch](https://esphome.io/components/switch/uart.html#configuration-variables)*

send_every.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: Sends recurring data instead of sending once.

*See also: [UART Switch](https://esphome.io/components/switch/uart.html#configuration-variables)*
